body_html: Basically, the Raw function doesn't initialize CUDA if you grab a CUDA type, where as the Opt and non-Opt functions do. I wrote a comment about this in one of my commits, but I can't find it anymore...

body: Basically, the Raw function doesn't initialize CUDA if you grab a CUDA type, where as the Opt and non-Opt functions do. I wrote a comment about this in one of my commits, but I can't find it anymore...
